thinking: My first task is to walk to the large rock on the left. I see a large rock on the left-hand side of my view, situated by the path near some stairs. To align myself towards it, I will turn left.
I have turned left. The large rock, my target, is now more centered in my view, though still slightly on the left-hand side. I need to get closer to it, so I will move forward.
I moved forward. The large rock is now clearly centered in my view and much closer. I need to continue moving towards it to reach it. I will move forward again.
I moved forward again. The large rock is now directly in front of me, very close. I have reached the first target, the large rock, as instructed.

I have reached the large rock, completing the first part of the task. The second part is to go to the tree further up the path. From my current position, I see the tree up the path, primarily on the right-hand side of my view. To face the tree and the path leading to it, I need to turn right.
I turned right. The target tree is now more centered, slightly on the right-hand side, and the path towards it is clear in front of me. I need to proceed towards the tree, so I will move forward.
I moved forward along the path. The target tree remains in front of me, slightly on the right-hand side. I need to keep following the path towards it. I will move forward again.

I moved forward again. The tree is now more distinctly on the right-hand side of my view as the path appears to curve slightly. To keep the tree centered in my path of travel, I will turn slightly to the right.
I turned slightly right. The target tree is now centered in my view again, directly up the path. I need to get closer to it, so I will move forward.
I moved forward. The tree is still centered in my view and getting closer. The path continues straight towards it. I will move forward again.
I moved forward again. The tree is directly in front of me and much larger in my view. I need to keep moving forward to reach its base.
I moved forward. The base of the tree is now very close, directly in front of me. I need to take another step forward to reach it.

I moved forward again. The trunk of the target tree is now very large and directly in front of me, filling the center of my view. I am almost at the tree. I will move forward one more step to ensure I have reached it.
I moved forward. I am now right next to the trunk of the tree, which dominates my view. It seems I need one more small step forward to be fully at the target location. I will move forward.

I moved forward again. I am now standing directly at the base of the target tree. I have successfully reached the second target specified in the instruction ("go to the tree further up the path"). This completes the task.
